attributes.action: Create more Parent and Baby parking spaces!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Create more Parent and Baby parking spaces and to have the same "law" restrictions applied as what's on the Disabled Parking spaces!

The supermarkets do not have enough Parent and Baby parking spaces. There should be Parent and Baby parking spaces in the town's also.

It is very difficult and sometimes even painfull for a heavily pregnant woman to get in and out of a car in regular spaces! 

With creating more spaces, more pregnant women and parent's with small children can use these without having to be stuck with smaller regular spaces!

We also ask for people who are not pregnant or who do not have small children with them to be fined or have their vehicles clamped when parking in the Parent and Baby parking spaces!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Create more Parent and Baby parking spaces!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22235


Prime Minister's Office
